title: Outset Chillware 76430 Reusable Drinking Straws, Bent, Glass, Set of 4 with Cleaning Brush
feature: Made of durable borosilicate glass; rust, scratch and break resistant
Fits all standard sized cups and includes a convenient cleaning brush for easy cleanup
Better than plastic disposable straws! eco-friendly & non-toxic - BPA free!
Elegant, sleek appearance; use in a Cocktail, smoothie or soda to sip in style
description: Go Green and Sip in style. Let this set of four reusable drinking straws take the place of waste-creating plastic straws. Made of strong borosilicate glass, not only are these must-haves rust, scratch and break resistant, but they also offer an elegant, sleek appearance, incomparable to those ordinary disposable straws. Included is a convenient cleaning brush, making cleanup a cinch. Fitting all standard sized Cups, these drinking straws are eco-friendly and non-toxic (BPA free!). the safer, and better, alternative to the average straw, for you and the environment.
